txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Scarred heartwood collected from the bog-lurkers found within Meluinen. Deliver the items to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath.
'It pains me to see such noble creatures twisted so. I hope that my research will find a way to bring the creatures peace; you have my thanks.'

'I have learned that many of the bog-lurkers dwelling in Meluinen are twisted and pained. Though it pains me to say this, the only cure for them requires us to find the source of the pain within their heartwood.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Scarred Heartwood
Thaliollang in the Elf-ruin of Meluinen at Lin Giliath requires the return of scarred heartwood.
Deliver the scarred heartwood to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath
You are on a task to collect scarred heartwood from the bog-lurkers of Meluinen and to deliver them to Thaliollang. Thaliollang can be found at Lin Giliath, the Elf-ruins of Meluinen.
Needed: Scarred heartwood collected from the bog-lurkers found within Meluinen.
